        Create the region counter.
        Parameters:
        featureCount - the number of features in the cultural model.
        agentList - the agents in the cultural model.
        space - the grid of agents in the cultural model.

      • countZones

        public int countZones()
        Count the number of cultural zones. A cultural zone is a set of contiguous sites, each of which has a neighbour with a "compatible" culture.
        Returns:
        the number of zones.

        Returns:
        the number of ones, twos, threes, ....
